pullRequest.title: Add option to import children of specific data record from OPAC
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add functionality to import child processes during OPAC import.
To enable this feature, one searchField of a catalog in kitodo_opac.xml needs to be configured with parentElement="true". This will enable a corresponding checkbox on the import tab.

If more than 10 children are found for the requested data record, a warning is displayed asking the user for confirmation.

Additionally, these changes adds exception handling for cases when a configured OPAC interface responds with anything but a success code to inform the user:

nodes.bodyText: why aren't you using a forEach loop?
Why aren't you using a ForEach loop?

afterCommit.message: Save main process after hierarchical import

commit.message: Add option to import children of specific data record from OPAC
Save main process after hierarchical import
Overload 'findByMetadata' to allow for exact searches
Refactor child import to reduce number of requests against OPAC interface
Add connection timeout to http client in SRUImport
